QuestData.Title: Re-Reclaim
QuestData.Description: Mogu do NOT use arcane magics.$b$bThey are thugs. They have always been thugs. Only when they ruled their empires in the old stories did they ever know any kind of magic.$b$bBut these mogu are using arcane portals and old artifacts. We need to stop them!$b$b$p, look for any artifacts the mogu are using to cast their magics with. I saw piles of these items being collected near the Ruins of Korja south of here.
QuestData.CompletionText: Every artifact in our possession is one less weapon in mogu hands.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done $p. You have removed the sword from the child's hands.
